articles.author: Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: Americans captured in Ukraine could face the death penalty; 'Calm before the storm' as Russians regroup in the east - CNBC
articles.content: Residents of the southern port city of Mariupol, which was seized by Russian forces in May, are on the verge of survival due to a lack of drinking water, according to the city's regional military adm… [+720 chars]
